verses.verse: Why do you stand<WH5975> far off,<WH7350> Yahweh?<WH3068> Why do you hide<WH5956> yourself in times<WH6256> of trouble?<WH6869>
In arrogance,<WH1346> the wicked<WH7563> hunt<WH1814> down the weak.<WH6041> They are caught<WH8610> in the schemes<WH4209> that<WH2098> they devise.<WH2803>
For the wicked<WH7563> boasts<WH1984> of his heart<WH5315>'s cravings.<WH8378> He blesses<WH1288> the greedy,<WH1214> and condemns<WH5006> Yahweh.<WH3068>
The wicked,<WH7563> in the pride<WH1363> of his face,<WH639> has no room<WH1875> in his thoughts<WH4209> for God.<WH430>
His ways<WH1870> are prosperous<WH2342> at all times.<WH6256> He is haughty,<WH4941> and your laws are far from<WH4791> his sight.<WH6887> As for all his adversaries, he sneers at them.<WH6315>
He says<WH559> in his heart,<WH3820> "I shall not be shaken.<WH4131> For generations<WH1755> I shall have no trouble.<WH7451>"
His mouth<WH6310> is full<WH4390> of cursing,<WH423> deceit,<WH4820> and oppression.<WH8496> Under his tongue<WH3956> is mischief<WH5999> and iniquity.<WH205>
He lies<WH3427> in wait near<WH3993> the villages.<WH2691> From ambushes,<WH4565> he murders<WH2026> the innocent.<WH5355> His eyes<WH5869> are secretly set<WH6845> against the helpless.<WH2489>

He lurks<WH693> in secret<WH4565> as a lion<WH738> in his ambush.<WH5520> He lies in wait<WH693> to catch<WH2414> the helpless.<WH6041> He catches<WH2414> the helpless,<WH6041> when he draws<WH4900> him in his net.<WH7568>
The helpless<WH2489> are crushed.<WH1794> They collapse.<WH7817> They fall<WH5307> under his strength.<WH6099>
He says<WH559> in his heart,<WH3820> "God<WH410> has forgotten.<WH7911> He hides<WH5641> his face.<WH6440> He will never<WH5331> see it.<WH7200>"
Arise,<WH6965> Yahweh!<WH3068> God,<WH410> lift up<WH5375> your hand!<WH3027> Don't<WH7911> forget the helpless.<WH6035>
Why does the wicked<WH7563> person condemn<WH5006> God,<WH430> and say<WH559> in his heart,<WH3820> "God won't<WH1875> call me into account?"
But you do<WH7200> see<WH5027> trouble<WH5999> and grief.<WH3708> You consider<WH5414> it to take<WH5800> it into your hand.<WH3027> You help<WH5826> the victim<WH2489> and the fatherless.<WH3490>
Break<WH7665> the arm<WH2220> of the wicked.<WH7563> As for the evil<WH7563> man,<WH1875> seek out his wickedness<WH7451> until you find<WH4672> none.<WH1077>
Yahweh<WH3068> is King<WH4428> forever<WH5703> and ever!<WH5769> The nations<WH1471> will perish<WH6> out of his land.<WH776>
Yahweh,<WH3068> you have heard<WH8085> the desire<WH8378> of the humble.<WH6035> You will prepare<WH3559> their heart.<WH3820> You will cause your ear<WH241> to hear,<WH7181>
to judge<WH8199> the fatherless<WH3490> and the oppressed,<WH1790> that man<WH582> who is of the earth<WH776> may terrify<WH6206> no more.<WH3254>
